00016 #ifndef BT_TRANSFORM_UTIL_H
00017 #define BT_TRANSFORM_UTIL_H

00019 #include "btTransform.h"
00020 #define ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD btScalar(0.5)*SIMD_HALF_PI
00021 
00022 
00023 
00024 
00025 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE btVector3 btAabbSupport(const btVector3& halfExtents,const btVector3& supportDir)
00026 {
00027         return btVector3(supportDir.x() < btScalar(0.0) ? -halfExtents.x() : halfExtents.x(),
00028       supportDir.y() < btScalar(0.0) ? -halfExtents.y() : halfExtents.y(),
00029       supportDir.z() < btScalar(0.0) ? -halfExtents.z() : halfExtents.z()); 
00030 }

00036 
00038 class btTransformUtil
00039 {
00040 
00041 public:
00042 
00043         static void integrateTransform(const btTransform& curTrans,const btVector3& linvel,const btVector3& angvel,btScalar timeStep,btTransform& predictedTransform)
00044         {
00045                 predictedTransform.setOrigin(curTrans.getOrigin() + linvel * timeStep);
00046 //      #define QUATERNION_DERIVATIVE
00047         #ifdef QUATERNION_DERIVATIVE
00048                 btQuaternion predictedOrn = curTrans.getRotation();
00049                 predictedOrn += (angvel * predictedOrn) * (timeStep * btScalar(0.5));
00050                 predictedOrn.safeNormalize();
00051         #else
00052                 //Exponential map
00053                 //google for "Practical Parameterization of Rotations Using the Exponential Map", F. Sebastian Grassia
00054 
00055                 btVector3 axis;
00056                 btScalar        fAngle2 = angvel.length2();
00057                 btScalar    fAngle = 0;
00058                 if (fAngle2>SIMD_EPSILON)
00059                 {
00060                         fAngle = btSqrt(fAngle2);
00061                 }
00062 
00063                 //limit the angular motion
00064                 if (fAngle*timeStep > ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD)
00065                 {
00066                         fAngle = ANGULAR_MOTION_THRESHOLD / timeStep;
00067                 }
00068 
00069                 if ( fAngle < btScalar(0.001) )
00070                 {
00071                         // use Taylor's expansions of sync function
00072                         axis   = angvel*( btScalar(0.5)*timeStep-(timeStep*timeStep*timeStep)*(btScalar(0.020833333333))*fAngle*fAngle );
00073                 }
00074                 else
00075                 {
00076                         // sync(fAngle) = sin(c*fAngle)/t
00077                         axis   = angvel*( btSin(btScalar(0.5)*fAngle*timeStep)/fAngle );
00078                 }
00079                 btQuaternion dorn (axis.x(),axis.y(),axis.z(),btCos( fAngle*timeStep*btScalar(0.5) ));
00080                 btQuaternion orn0 = curTrans.getRotation();
00081 
00082                 btQuaternion predictedOrn = dorn * orn0;
00083                 predictedOrn.safeNormalize();
00084         #endif
00085                 if (predictedOrn.length2()>SIMD_EPSILON)
00086                 {
00087                         predictedTransform.setRotation(predictedOrn);
00088                 }
00089                 else
00090                 {
00091                         predictedTransform.setBasis(curTrans.getBasis());
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 
00095         static void     calculateVelocityQuaternion(const btVector3& pos0,const btVector3& pos1,const btQuaternion& orn0,const btQuaternion& orn1,btScalar timeStep,btVector3& linVel,btVector3& angVel)
00096         {
00097                 linVel = (pos1 - pos0) / timeStep;
00098                 btVector3 axis;
00099                 btScalar  angle;
00100                 if (orn0 != orn1)
00101                 {
00102                         calculateDiffAxisAngleQuaternion(orn0,orn1,axis,angle);
00103                         angVel = axis * angle / timeStep;
00104                 } else
00105                 {
00106                         angVel.setValue(0,0,0);
00107                 }
00108         }
00109 
00110         static void calculateDiffAxisAngleQuaternion(const btQuaternion& orn0,const btQuaternion& orn1a,btVector3& axis,btScalar& angle)
00111         {
00112                 btQuaternion orn1 = orn0.nearest(orn1a);
00113                 btQuaternion dorn = orn1 * orn0.inverse();
00114                 angle = dorn.getAngle();
00115                 axis = btVector3(dorn.x(),dorn.y(),dorn.z());
00116                 axis[3] = btScalar(0.);
00117                 //check for axis length
00118                 btScalar len = axis.length2();
00119                 if (len < SIMD_EPSILON*SIMD_EPSILON)
00120                         axis = btVector3(btScalar(1.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.));
00121                 else
00122                         axis /= btSqrt(len);
00123         }
00124 
00125         static void     calculateVelocity(const btTransform& transform0,const btTransform& transform1,btScalar timeStep,btVector3& linVel,btVector3& angVel)
00126         {
00127                 linVel = (transform1.getOrigin() - transform0.getOrigin()) / timeStep;
00128                 btVector3 axis;
00129                 btScalar  angle;
00130                 calculateDiffAxisAngle(transform0,transform1,axis,angle);
00131                 angVel = axis * angle / timeStep;
00132         }
00133 
00134         static void calculateDiffAxisAngle(const btTransform& transform0,const btTransform& transform1,btVector3& axis,btScalar& angle)
00135         {
00136                 btMatrix3x3 dmat = transform1.getBasis() * transform0.getBasis().inverse();
00137                 btQuaternion dorn;
00138                 dmat.getRotation(dorn);
00139 
00141                 dorn.normalize();
00142                 
00143                 angle = dorn.getAngle();
00144                 axis = btVector3(dorn.x(),dorn.y(),dorn.z());
00145                 axis[3] = btScalar(0.);
00146                 //check for axis length
00147                 btScalar len = axis.length2();
00148                 if (len < SIMD_EPSILON*SIMD_EPSILON)
00149                         axis = btVector3(btScalar(1.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.));
00150                 else
00151                         axis /= btSqrt(len);
00152         }
00153 
00154 };
00155 
00156 
00159 class   btConvexSeparatingDistanceUtil
00160 {
00161         btQuaternion    m_ornA;
00162         btQuaternion    m_ornB;
00163         btVector3       m_posA;
00164         btVector3       m_posB;
00165         
00166         btVector3       m_separatingNormal;
00167 
00168         btScalar        m_boundingRadiusA;
00169         btScalar        m_boundingRadiusB;
00170         btScalar        m_separatingDistance;
00171 
00172 public:
00173 
00174         btConvexSeparatingDistanceUtil(btScalar boundingRadiusA,btScalar        boundingRadiusB)
00175                 :m_boundingRadiusA(boundingRadiusA),
00176                 m_boundingRadiusB(boundingRadiusB),
00177                 m_separatingDistance(0.f)
00178         {
00179         }
00180 
00181         btScalar        getConservativeSeparatingDistance()
00182         {
00183                 return m_separatingDistance;
00184         }
00185 
00186         void    updateSeparatingDistance(const btTransform& transA,const btTransform& transB)
00187         {
00188                 const btVector3& toPosA = transA.getOrigin();
00189                 const btVector3& toPosB = transB.getOrigin();
00190                 btQuaternion toOrnA = transA.getRotation();
00191                 btQuaternion toOrnB = transB.getRotation();
00192 
00193                 if (m_separatingDistance>0.f)
00194                 {
00195                         
00196 
00197                         btVector3 linVelA,angVelA,linVelB,angVelB;
00198                         btTransformUtil::calculateVelocityQuaternion(m_posA,toPosA,m_ornA,toOrnA,btScalar(1.),linVelA,angVelA);
00199                         btTransformUtil::calculateVelocityQuaternion(m_posB,toPosB,m_ornB,toOrnB,btScalar(1.),linVelB,angVelB);
00200                         btScalar maxAngularProjectedVelocity = angVelA.length() * m_boundingRadiusA + angVelB.length() * m_boundingRadiusB;
00201                         btVector3 relLinVel = (linVelB-linVelA);
00202                         btScalar relLinVelocLength = relLinVel.dot(m_separatingNormal);
00203                         if (relLinVelocLength<0.f)
00204                         {
00205                                 relLinVelocLength = 0.f;
00206                         }
00207         
00208                         btScalar        projectedMotion = maxAngularProjectedVelocity +relLinVelocLength;
00209                         m_separatingDistance -= projectedMotion;
00210                 }
00211         
00212                 m_posA = toPosA;
00213                 m_posB = toPosB;
00214                 m_ornA = toOrnA;
00215                 m_ornB = toOrnB;
00216         }
00217 
00218         void    initSeparatingDistance(const btVector3& separatingVector,btScalar separatingDistance,const btTransform& transA,const btTransform& transB)
00219         {
00220                 m_separatingDistance = separatingDistance;
00221 
00222                 if (m_separatingDistance>0.f)
00223                 {
00224                         m_separatingNormal = separatingVector;
00225                         
00226                         const btVector3& toPosA = transA.getOrigin();
00227                         const btVector3& toPosB = transB.getOrigin();
00228                         btQuaternion toOrnA = transA.getRotation();
00229                         btQuaternion toOrnB = transB.getRotation();
00230                         m_posA = toPosA;
00231                         m_posB = toPosB;
00232                         m_ornA = toOrnA;
00233                         m_ornB = toOrnB;
00234                 }
00235         }
00236 
00237 };
